subject: Re: [junit] New to this group
messageBody:
> I am new to this group.

Welcome!

You should first start by some reading. The welcome email you received when
subscribing to the group lists a lot of good references for writing and
executing tests. The FAQ is also a good start (browse www.junit.org).

> 1. How to run the failed test cases and test suites in the second time.

The Swing and Awt runner list the failed tests and you can rerun them (with or
without reloading the code. Be aware of the famous 'linkage error' feature,
see the FAQ for more details)

> 2. Is it possible to create a project in which I could create various
> test suites, each for each components in my product

you're absolutely free to create as many suites as you want. Some define one
TestSuite per package, some one per project, some per goal (unit vs.
integration). There's no rules.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
